Reviews.Title: Angi
Reviews.Author: Angi González
Reviews.Content: Happy with the product, I loved my camera fascinates me, what was expected, recommend you to my friends and family. Thank you

Reviews.Title: Lens was broken
Reviews.Author: Arleth R.
Reviews.Content: Len was broken, It was a gift for my dad and very disapointed. He does not want it but does not want to return it either.

Reviews.Title: Sony Cybershot DSC-H90 16x Optical Zoom
Reviews.Author: In to comfort and ease
Reviews.Content: This camera is ok, but I like another model better. The other model has  more selections for picture taking on the top dial.I returned it, but it is a good camera and the package makes it special.

Reviews.Title: love it
Reviews.Author: Larry James Enterprises
Reviews.Content: the kit is very helpful to someone who is just starting out and the camera itself takes very good pictures
